attributes.action: Re-instate Manchester with the super casino
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: A complete waste of tax payers money to scrap the plans for the super casino. If built, the super casino could be used to cover taxes like the casino in monaco and hopefully reduce the cost of tax to a more reasonable amount, the casino can also offer thousands more jobs if built which should help with any unemployment issues in the community.
